search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LaGrowthMachine (lagrowthmachine.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text:
The official pricing page for LaGrowthMachine can be found at:

[https://lagrowthmachine.com/pricing/](https://lagrowthmachine.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Starting 4 identities

Enrich your leads  
for **free and  
without limits.**
------------------------------------------------------

Find your leads’ missing information **automatically. Effortlessly.**   
No need to pay for an enrichment tool. La Growth Machine does it for you!

![Image 17](https://lagrowthmachine.twic.pics/https://lagrowthmachine.com/app/uploads/2024/09/enrich-LGM-EN.png?twic=v1/cover=1024:750/max=2000)

Trusted by 25,000 users
-----------------------

![Image 18](https://lagrowthmachine.twic.pics/https://lagrowthmachine.com/app/uploads/2023/08/pink-stars.svg)

Frequently asked questions **answered**
---------------------------------------

Yes !

You can try La Growth Machine for Free, without card details, **for 14 days**. No strings attached.

Lucky you! The free trial allows you to test **all the features** available in La Growth Machine, except for custom sequences.

Custom sequences, in fact, require advanced knowledge of outreach. That’s why we prefer to provide you with **ready-to-use template sequences**, so you can make your initial campaigns perform during the testing phase.

Do you still want to test custom sequences? Contact support via the chat, and they will know what to do.

**As many as you want.** La Growth Machine does not limit you in any way.

Since an email or LinkedIn account can only send a limited number of messages a day, it will vary between campaigns.

An identity is a seat for which you can **automate on all three channels** (LinkedIn + Email + Twitter).

Should you need to automate for 2 people, you will need 2 identities

You can add another identity (or seat) directly within the app.

**Note:** During your free-trial you only have access to 1 identity, upgrade your account to add multiple identities.

If you have multiple identities, each identity is billed but the **same billing account** is used for the payment.

Of course !

At **any moment**, you can downgrade, upgrade, end all your subscriptions, switch to monthly, switch to yearly, add an identity, remove an identity, buy 3 vacuum-packed hams.

Oops, that’s my grocery shopping list.

Yes, **unlimited**. Like really really unlimited.

Regarding lead details, when a lead is enriched you can receive: email (pro & personal), phone number, Twitter, company name, company website, gender, LinkedIn profile, and many more.

We’re using Waterfall Enrichment to find your leads’ email. Read more [here](https://lagrowthmachine.com/features/waterfall-enrichment/).

HubSpot and Pipedrive are supported natively.

Connecting your CRM takes 1 min and La Growth Machine will take care of the rest. Leads will automatically be created and **every action and message will be synchronized** on your contact’s timeline.

Advanced features include automated lifecycle updates based on triggers, integrations with HubSpot & Pipedrive’s workflows and much more…

Not using HubSpot or Pipedrive?

**Any CRM can be connected to LGM** using our Zapier integration in 5min. That includes Salesforce, Close.io, Freshsales, Copper and Zoho, to name just a few

Social companies are organizations that combine economic activity with **social or environmental objectives.**

They place the human and collective interest at the heart of their approach, thus promoting a more just and sustainable economy.

To get the discount as a company that strives to have a **social** or **environmental** impact. Please make sure to follow **these steps below.**

**Step 1:** Sign-up & start your free-trial on LaGrowthMachine (you can click here to [register](https://app.lagrowthmachine.com/register))  
If you already have an account, skip this step.

**Step 2:** Contact our support with the live chat (on the bottom-left corner of the app) and ask them about the discount available for social companies.  
(Disable your ad blockers if you don’t see the live chat icon)

**Step 3:** Our support team will take care of you personally and give you a unique discount if you’re eligible.

**A member** is a person from your company who **has a La Growth Machine account and a widget**. A company can have as many members as specified in each plan (3 for the Basic plan and 25 for the Pro and Ultimate plans).

By inviting a **free member**, they will be able to:

*   Import leads, create leads, and prepare campaigns
*   Access the account to view campaign performance and qualify leads
*   Respond to LinkedIn messages and emails under each identity

**A member cannot launch a campaign**. Their Google and LinkedIn accounts are not connected, so they cannot launch a campaign under their name.

To do this, you need to have subscribed to an identity with La Growth Machine. **An identity equals a license**. An identity can then launch campaigns using their profile.

Depending on your plan, **it’s possible to have multiple identities**:

*   Up to 3 identities with the Basic plan (3 licenses and therefore 3 billed identities)
*   No identity limit for the Pro and Ultimate plans

Clearer now? Come see for yourself!

Do you only believe  
**what you see?**

No credit card required, cancel at any time.

Growth shouldn't break the bank. Explore La Growth Machine's transparent pricing and find the perfect plan tailored for your business needs.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on identities, with each identity billed separately. Discounts are available for agencies and social companies.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Advanced plan with additional integrations and features.
Comprehensive plan with CRM integrations and unlimited features.

promotional_offers.offer_description: 20% discount on all plans for agencies.
